title.en: Princess of Thieves: Don't Mess With My Prince

altTitles.zh: 神偷王妃：我家王爷惹不起

altTitles.zh-hk: 神偷王妃：我家王爺惹不起

altTitles.zh-ro: Shentou Wangfei: Wojia Wangye Re Bu Qi
Shéntōu Wángfēi: Wǒjiā Wángyé Rě Bù Qǐ

altTitles.en: Mysterious Thief Princess: My Prince Can't Afford to Provoke
The Thief Princess: My Prince Can't Afford to Offend

description.en: She is a master thief from the modern century who transmigrated into the body of the useless daughter of the Prime Minister's first wife! Since she died in her previous life, she is determined to make them experience a crushing defeat in this life! "I've lost my memories? What a joke. I'll blind you with my dazzling wit and courage! I'll fight the Prince of Chen, defeat the Crown Prince, and make them all bow and kiss my feet! Do I really look like a useless thing to you, Second and Third Sister? The most beautiful man, the powerful god of war, was humiliated by a gay man who even touched his...'thing'? Don't you dare run away. I will catch you even if I have to scour heaven and earth!"
